text: A batch file is a special kind of computer file that tells a computer a list of instructions to do in order. Batch files were used a lot when DOS was used by many people. They are good for automating many small pieces of work. Some people still use batch files today. ==Hello World example== This is an example of a batch file. It is called a "Hello World" example because it prints the text "Hello World!" to the screen. @ECHO off ECHO Hello World! PAUSE When that text is put into a file with an extension of .bat, saved, and run, it will put this on the screen: Hello World! Press any key to continue . . . Category:Computer programming
title: Batch file
